00001 // S03 package to perform Wigner transform on the rotation group SO(3)

00039 #include <stdio.h>
00040 #include <stdlib.h>
00041 #include <complex.h>
00042 #include <time.h>

00044 #include <so3.h>
00045 
00046 #define NREPEAT 10
00047 #define MIN(a,b) ((a < b) ? (a) : (b))
00048 #define MAX(a,b) ((a > b) ? (a) : (b))
00049 
00050 double get_max_error(complex double *expected, complex double *actual, int n);
00051 double ran2_dp(int idum);
00052 void so3_test_gen_flmn_complex(complex double *flmn, const so3_parameters_t *parameters, int seed);
00053 void so3_test_gen_flmn_real(complex double *flmn, const so3_parameters_t *parameters, int seed);

00055 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00056 {
00057     so3_parameters_t parameters = {};
00058     int Lmax, L, useLasN, N, L0;
00059     complex double *flmn_orig, *flmn_syn;
00060     complex double *f;
00061     double *f_real;
00062     int seed;
00063     clock_t time_start, time_end;
00064     int i, real;
00065     int flmn_size;
00066 
00067     const char *n_order_str[SO3_N_ORDER_SIZE];
00068     const char *storage_mode_str[SO3_STORAGE_SIZE];
00069     const char *n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_SIZE];
00070     const char *reality_str[2];
00071     const char *sampling_str[2];
00072 
00073     double min_duration_inverse;
00074     double min_duration_forward;
00075     double avg_duration_inverse;
00076     double avg_duration_forward;
00077     double avg_error;
00078 
00079     n_order_str[SO3_N_ORDER_ZERO_FIRST] = "n = 0 first";
00080     n_order_str[SO3_N_ORDER_NEGATIVE_FIRST] = "n = -N+1 first";
00081 
00082     storage_mode_str[SO3_STORAGE_PADDED] = "padded storage";
00083     storage_mode_str[SO3_STORAGE_COMPACT] = "compact storage";
00084 
00085     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_ALL] = "all n";
00086     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_EVEN] = "only even n";
00087     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_ODD] = "only odd n";
00088     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_MAXIMUM] = "only |n| = N-1";
00089 
00090     reality_str[0] = "complex";
00091     reality_str[1] = "real";
00092 
00093     sampling_str[0] = "MW";
00094     sampling_str[1] = "MWSS";
00095 
00096     // Parse command line arguments
00097     N = Lmax = 64;
00098     useLasN = 1; // true
00099     L0 = 0;
00100     seed = 1;
00101     if (argc > 1)
00102         Lmax = atoi(argv[1]);
00103     if (argc > 2)
00104         L0 = atoi(argv[2]);
00105     if (argc > 3)
00106     {
00107         useLasN = 0; // false
00108         N = atoi(argv[3]);
00109         parameters.N = N;
00110     }
00111 
00112     parameters.L0 = L0;
00113     parameters.verbosity = 0;
00114 
00115     // (2*N-1)*L*L is the largest number of flmn ever needed. For more
00116     // compact storage modes, only part of the memory will be used.
00117     flmn_orig = malloc((2*N-1)*Lmax*Lmax * sizeof *flmn_orig);
00118     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(flmn_orig);
00119     flmn_syn = malloc((2*N-1)*Lmax*Lmax * sizeof *flmn_syn);
00120     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(flmn_syn);
00121 
00122     // We only need (2*L) * (L+1) * (2*N-1) samples for MW symmetric sampling.
00123     // For the usual MW sampling, only part of the memory will be used.
00124     f = malloc((2*Lmax)*(Lmax+1)*(2*N-1) * sizeof *f);
00125     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f);
00126     f_real = malloc((2*Lmax)*(Lmax+1)*(2*N-1) * sizeof *f_real);
00127     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_real);
00128 
00129     // Output header row
00130     printf("reality;L;N;avg_duration_inverse;avg_duration_forward;min_duration_inverse;min_duration_forward;avg_error\n");
00131 
00132     parameters.sampling_scheme = SO3_SAMPLING_MW;
00133     parameters.n_order = SO3_N_ORDER_ZERO_FIRST;
00134     parameters.storage = SO3_STORAGE_PADDED;
00135     parameters.n_mode = SO3_N_MODE_ALL;
00136 
00137     // real == 0 --> complex signal
00138     // real == 1 --> real signal
00139     for (real = 0; real < 2; ++real)
00140     {
00141         parameters.reality = real;
00142 
00143         L = 1;
00144         while(L <= Lmax)
00145         {
00146             if (L <= L0 || (!useLasN && L < N))
00147             {
00148                 L *= 2;
00149                 continue;
00150             }
00151 
00152             parameters.L = L;
00153             if (useLasN)
00154             {
00155                 N = L;
00156                 parameters.N = L;
00157             }
00158 
00159             min_duration_inverse = 0.0;
00160             min_duration_forward = 0.0;
00161             avg_duration_inverse = 0.0;
00162             avg_duration_forward = 0.0;
00163             avg_error = 0.0;
00164 
00165             for (i = 0; i < NREPEAT; ++i)
00166             {
00167                 int j;
00168                 double duration;
00169 
00170                 // Reset output array
00171                 for (j = 0; j < (2*N-1)*L*L; ++j)
00172                     flmn_syn[j] = 0.0;
00173 
00174                 if (real) so3_test_gen_flmn_real(flmn_orig, &parameters, seed);
00175                 else      so3_test_gen_flmn_complex(flmn_orig, &parameters, seed);
00176 
00177                 time_start = clock();
00178                 if (real) so3_core_inverse_via_ssht_real(f_real, flmn_orig, &parameters);
00179                 else      so3_core_inverse_via_ssht(f, flmn_orig, &parameters);
00180                 time_end = clock();
00181 
00182                 duration = (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00183                 avg_duration_inverse = avg_duration_inverse + duration / NREPEAT;
00184                 if (!i || duration < min_duration_inverse)
00185                     min_duration_inverse = duration;
00186 
00187                 time_start = clock();
00188                 if (real) so3_core_forward_via_ssht_real(flmn_syn, f_real, &parameters);
00189                 else      so3_core_forward_via_ssht(flmn_syn, f, &parameters);
00190                 time_end = clock();
00191 
00192                 duration = (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00193                 avg_duration_forward = avg_duration_forward + duration / NREPEAT;
00194                 if (!i || duration < min_duration_forward)
00195                     min_duration_forward = duration;
00196 
00197                 flmn_size = so3_sampling_flmn_size(&parameters);
00198                 avg_error += get_max_error(flmn_orig, flmn_syn, flmn_size)/NREPEAT;
00199             }
00200 
00201             printf("%d;%d;%d;%f;%f;%f;%f;%e\n",
00202                    real,
00203                    L,
00204                    N,
00205                    avg_duration_inverse,
00206                    avg_duration_forward,
00207                    min_duration_inverse,
00208                    min_duration_forward,
00209                    avg_error);
00210 
00211             L *= 2;
00212         }
00213     }
00214 
00215     free(flmn_orig);
00216     free(flmn_syn);
00217     free(f);
00218     free(f_real);
00219 
00220     return 0;
00221 }
00222 
00223 double get_max_error(complex double *expected, complex double *actual, int n)
00224 {
00225     int i;
00226     double error, maxError = 0;
00227 
00228     for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00229     {
00230         error = cabs(expected[i] - actual[i]);
00231         maxError = MAX(error, maxError);
00232     }
00233 
00234     return maxError;
00235 }
00236 
00253 void so3_test_gen_flmn_complex(
00254     complex double *flmn,
00255     const so3_parameters_t *parameters,
00256     int seed)
00257 {
00258     int L0, L, N;
00259     int i, el, m, n, n_start, n_stop, n_inc, ind;
00260 
00261     L0 = parameters->L0;
00262     L = parameters->L;
00263     N = parameters->N;
00264 
00265     for (i = 0; i < (2*N-1)*L*L; ++i)
00266         flmn[i] = 0.0;
00267 
00268     switch (parameters->n_mode)
00269     {
00270     case SO3_N_MODE_ALL:
00271         n_start = -N+1;
00272         n_stop  =  N-1;
00273         n_inc = 1;
00274         break;
00275     case SO3_N_MODE_EVEN:
00276         n_start = ((N-1) % 2 == 0) ? -N+1 : -N+2;
00277         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 == 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
00278         n_inc = 2;
00279         break;
00280     case SO3_N_MODE_ODD:
00281         n_start = ((N-1) % 2 != 0) ? -N+1 : -N+2;
00282         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 != 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
00283         n_inc = 2;
00284         break;
00285     case SO3_N_MODE_MAXIMUM:
00286         n_start = -N+1;
00287         n_stop  =  N-1;
00288         n_inc = 2*N - 2;
00289         break;
00290     default:
00291         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-mode.");
00292     }
00293 
00294     for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
00295     {
00296         for (el = MAX(L0, abs(n)); el < L; ++el)
00297         {
00298             for (m = -el; m <= el; ++m)
00299             {
00300                 so3_sampling_elmn2ind(&ind, el, m, n, parameters);
00301                 flmn[ind] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0) + I * (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00302             }
00303         }
00304     }
00305 }
00306 
00326 void so3_test_gen_flmn_real(
00327     complex double *flmn,
00328     const so3_parameters_t *parameters,
00329     int seed)
00330 {
00331     int L0, L, N;
00332     int i, el, m, n, n_start, n_stop, n_inc, ind;
00333     double real, imag;
00334 
00335     L0 = parameters->L0;
00336     L = parameters->L;
00337     N = parameters->N;
00338 
00339     for (i = 0; i < (2*N-1)*L*L; ++i)
00340         flmn[i] = 0.0;
00341 
00342     switch (parameters->n_mode)
00343     {
00344     case SO3_N_MODE_ALL:
00345         n_start = 0;
00346         n_stop  = N-1;
00347         n_inc = 1;
00348         break;
00349     case SO3_N_MODE_EVEN:
00350         n_start = 0;
00351         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 == 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
00352         n_inc = 2;
00353         break;
00354     case SO3_N_MODE_ODD:
00355         n_start = 1;
00356         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 != 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
00357         n_inc = 2;
00358         break;
00359     case SO3_N_MODE_MAXIMUM:
00360         n_start = N-1;
00361         n_stop  = N-1;
00362         n_inc = 1;
00363         break;
00364     default:
00365         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-mode.");
00366     }
00367 
00368     for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
00369     {
00370         if (n == 0)
00371         {
00372             // Fill fl00 with random real values
00373             for (el = L0; el < L; ++el)
00374             {
00375                 so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, 0, 0, parameters);
00376                 flmn[ind] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00377             }
00378 
00379             // Fill fl+-m0 with conjugated random values
00380 
00381             for (el = L0; el < L; ++el)
00382             {
00383                 for (m = 1; m <= el; ++m)
00384                 {
00385                     real = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00386                     imag = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00387                     so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, m, 0, parameters);
00388                     flmn[ind] = real + imag * I;
00389                     so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, -m, 0, parameters);
00390                     flmn[ind] = real - imag * I;
00391                     if (m % 2)
00392                         flmn[ind] = - real + imag * I;
00393                     else
00394                         flmn[ind] = real - imag * I;
00395                 }
00396             }
00397         }
00398         else
00399         {
00400             for (el = MAX(L0, n); el < L; ++el)
00401             {
00402                 for (m = -el; m <= el; ++m)
00403                 {
00404 
00405                     so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, m, n, parameters);
00406                     flmn[ind] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0) + I * (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00407                 }
00408             }
00409         }
00410     }
00411 }
00412 
00426 double ran2_dp(int idum)
00427 {
00428     int IM1=2147483563,IM2=2147483399,IMM1=IM1-1,
00429         IA1=40014,IA2=40692,IQ1=53668,IQ2=52774,IR1=12211,IR2=3791,
00430         NTAB=32,NDIV=1+IMM1/NTAB;
00431 
00432     double AM=1./IM1,EPS=1.2e-7,RNMX=1.-EPS;
00433     int j,k;
00434     static int iv[32],iy,idum2 = 123456789;
00435     // N.B. in C static variables are initialised to 0 by default.
00436 
00437     if (idum <= 0) {
00438         idum= (-idum>1 ? -idum : 1); // max(-idum,1);
00439         idum2=idum;
00440         for(j=NTAB+8;j>=1;j--) {
00441             k=idum/IQ1;
00442             idum=IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1;
00443             if (idum < 0) idum=idum+IM1;
00444             if (j < NTAB) iv[j-1]=idum;
00445         }
00446         iy=iv[0];
00447     }
00448     k=idum/IQ1;
00449     idum=IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1;
00450     if (idum < 0) idum=idum+IM1;
00451     k=idum2/IQ2;
00452     idum2=IA2*(idum2-k*IQ2)-k*IR2;
00453     if (idum2 < 0) idum2=idum2+IM2;
00454     j=1+iy/NDIV;
00455     iy=iv[j-1]-idum2;
00456     iv[j-1]=idum;
00457     if(iy < 1)iy=iy+IMM1;
00458     return (AM*iy < RNMX ? AM*iy : RNMX); // min(AM*iy,RNMX);
00459 }
